H0.text: The musical 'Sunday In The Park With George' was inspired by a painting by which artist. Claude Monet

H1.text: The musical 'Sunday In The Park With George' was inspired by a painting by which artist. Pierre-Auguste Renoir

H2.text: The musical 'Sunday In The Park With George' was inspired by a painting by which artist. Camille Pissarro

H3.text: The musical 'Sunday In The Park With George' was inspired by a painting by which artist. Seurat

A4.text: It was inspired by the French pointillist painter Georges Seurat's painting A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of La Grande Jatte (painted 1884â€“1886).
